But don't take my word for it, watch all the youtubers and streamers. btw i will most likely die because of playing this game to much.

This is a game where many important bugs related to the game.
    This is the responsibility of the operator, but those many bugs are hard to fix even after a sufficient period of time.
    Isn't there a game that can't fix bugs like this? I think that it is a game company that can be held responsible for management.
    By the way, I paid at the beginning, but stopped immediately and enjoyed the game without paying. Not worth the buying
 However, I just play the game just to see how the management side fulfills the responsibility to the customer and provide the game environment.
This game company hardly feels corporation effort.
zly balanc medzi vrahom a survivor.

An sich haben sie inzwischen schon echt einiges an dem Game gefixt, aber meine Fresse, dieses scheiÃŸ Easy Anti Cheat zerschieÃŸt mir jedes mal mein Dead by Daylight. Und das wirklich regelmÃ¤ÃŸig. Ich hab auch ehrlich wenig Bock mich jedes Mal dann erstmal ner Viertelstunde hinzusetzen und zu warten, dass die Fehler wieder behoben werden. Wo auch immer die herkommen, ohne dass ich was an dem Game mache.
Im Ernst Leute, kriegt die ScheiÃŸe doch nach so langer Zeit endlich mal gebacken!
This game is truly a horror master-piece with its graphics and all the killers to chose from.

Am Anfang war ich eher skeptisch weil ich Runden basierte Games nicht mag. Durch die angenehme Steuerung und die wirklich tollen Killer Charakter Designs habe ich dann doch beschlossen dem Spiel eine Chance zu geben. Jetzt freue ich mich schon richtig drauf ein paar Runden zu zocken bin ein MEGA Fan geworden! Hammer Game.

This game has some issues, I'm not gonna lie. But for an asymmetrical game it has done the best so far. The game is a lot of fun and has kept me playing for years on console. It's good enough that I decided to buy it on pc as well. I recommend you try this game
We need more decent players in this game
Es un juego muy atrapante, no porque tenga trama sino porque crea un buen ambiente de tensiÃ³n al no tener chat de voz y tener que guiarse por los sonidos. Perfecto para pasar el rato.
Very addictive! Enjoyable experience for everyone!
Needs some balance here and there but the game is great

too many bugs and too many losers gg devs you've RUINED the game

Great game, but so suck if you wanna play alone. Sometimes fearful atmosphere, sometimes funny, sometimes farming, sometimes imbalance. This is the game that you can play for not a long, take a break and start play in some time in the future.
Tolles Spiel. Manchmal etwas Nervig, aber auch sehr Lustig. Ich Spiele es sehr gern und werde es weiterhin spielen.

Ainda acho que tem uns Hitbox Injustos, porÃ©m o jogo Ã© super divertido e nÃ£o me enjoou nunca :D

Its a shit game.
Killers tunneling and camping because they are too bad too handle the Ruin-nerf.
They can see your name from the start, so if you played them out last game, they now know who they will camp twice as much. 
Teammates suck and team up with the killer (and hunt together other survivors) so the killer let them escape in the end.
The ranking system is pure shit. Its probably even the worst part of the game, maybe even the worst ranking system i have ever seen in a game, and instead of fixing it, it gets worse every few patches.
You get matched with people of every other rank (doesnt matter if rank 1 or rank 20). Result is, good players are fkn held back by their teammates (who do absolutely nothing other than hide the whole game), and noobies cant handle good killers and getting frustrated.
The new dedicated servers suck. I mean wtf. We thought everything gets better, now everyone wants the old system back.
Some perks are so fkd up by the new servers and patches, you can take them and throw them directly in to the trash.
The report system does nothing. Really. It doesnt matter if you get reported, so you can actually make everything you want, without fear of getting punished. Very good system. People are as toxic as they could be. Flaming each other down in after game chat and wishing you death.
I mean WTF is even wrong with the devs. So many problems with this game and everytime they say they will fix it, its gets worse. Fuck that.
